availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Achilles C. Daniel (Montgomery County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, carpenter, postmaster, and attorney. Kentucky native. Carpenter in Estill County, Kentucky, in 1850. United States postmaster in Powell County in 1853. Attorney in Powell County in 1860. Attorney in Powell County in 1862. Attorney in Montgomery County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 61A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, p. 53.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 15, Powell County, Kentucky, 1862.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Montgomery County, KY, October 1863, p. 106.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, Records of the Post Office Department, NARA Series M841, RG 28, Powell County, Kentucky, vol. 14, p. 748.
